name: Ohrwurm Game
description:
Musical ear training experience! Use a simple colourful keyboard with a couple of activated keys and beat 100 levels with melodies to play after listening.

Game benefits:
- Intuitively recognise the notes played in music.
- Improve your musical memory.
- Match the rhythm.
- Uncover the beauty of how the melodies are being created.
- Get ready to learn playing a real instrument.
- Become motivated to achieve things.

A big thanks to all those buddies who have already downloaded and played “Ohrwurm”! Don’t forget to write a review and like us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/ohrwurm.game) or follow us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/OhrwurmGame).
